content: any cups you make but you are back to your original stitch count please credit me as the designer thanks video links bobbles 3 ways how to use dpns in the round how to do a kfb how to do a ssk abbreviations k = knit kfb = knit front and back increasing 1 stitch k2tog = knit 2 together 1 st decreased mb= make bobble ssk = slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knit-wise one at a time to your right needle then return the now-turned stitches back to the left needle knit them both together through the back loop decreasing 1 st s = stitch es 2
